caption: Creates new generators and commands
summary: This generator was installed when you ran 'pcgen init' in current project. It is not required for pcgen to work, but it helps to create new generators in your projects, and serves as a simple example on how to create a generator

details.author: Iskander Sierra
details.description: Allows creating new generators in your local project

commands.name: new
commands.caption: Create a new simple file based generator

details.description: Default command to generate the entire project
